remarks: A property of functions on ordinal numbers.  Generalization of Theorem Schema 8E of [Enderton] p. 218.  (Contributed by Eric Schmidt, 26-May-2009.)
statement:
onfununi.1 $e |- ( Lim y -> ( F ` y ) = U_ x e. y ( F ` x ) ) $.
onfununi.2 $e |- ( ( x e. On /\ y e. On /\ x C_ y ) -> ( F ` x ) C_ ( F ` y ) ) $.
onfununi $p |- ( ( S e. T /\ S C_ On /\ S =/= (/) ) -> ( F ` U. S ) = U_ x e. S ( F ` x ) ) $.
$d F x y $.
$d S x y $.
$d T x $.
